title: 【外媒要正視聽】On fire to buy time for peaceful protesters to leave

replies.msg:
What supposed to be a peaceful and legal protest in Central, calling on President Trump to intervene in the ongoing Hong Kong political standoff, escalated rapidly this afternoon after the police appeared to arrest a number of people in the busy Central subway station, then closed all the nearby subway stations, and, out of the blue, demanded the protest to end in 45 minutes, leaving thousands of peaceful protesters stuck on the road and struggling to leave the area.

Some protesters decided to erect a barricade at one of the subway exits before setting it on fire to block the police and buy time for other peaceful protesters to leave when the riot police armed with rifles in the subway station started charging towards the leaving crowds after the 4:45pm deadline.
